ActorTalk: Flourish... Guild...
But... how did the... spices end up... in Ocean Heart's food?
The Flourish Guild likely slipped the spices into Ocean Heart's ingredients to stir up conflict between you.
No wonder the patties tasted weird lately, rawr!
I see... So... we wrongfully blamed... Ocean Heart.
Told you we were innocent, rawr!
On behalf... of the Akdilek branch... I sincerely... apologize to Ocean Heart...
It's fine. What matters is we cleared things up. You were victims too, and we'll all be doing business here together, rawr!
Thank you... Gray Raven Commandant... and Miss Lucia.
You're very welcome. And please continue supporting the commandant's work going forward.
Gray Raven Commandant... to show our support... Akdilek... is ready to join the committee.
Ocean Heart will keep its word too, and follow your lead, rawr!
It seems we've successfully foiled the Flourish Guild's plot to turn the merchants against each other, Commandant.
I only did what I could to help you, Commandant.
Still, I didn't expect the trouble behind this square to involve a group like Kurono.
I can't shake the feeling this isn't over yet... For now, I'd like to stay close and support you, Commandant.
The square's construction will likely take a while to finish.
While I'm on leave, I'll be counting on you to take care of the squad's missions.
Understood. I'll handle squad operations during this time. Please don't worry, Commandant.
And if you need any help with things here, contact me right away. No matter what it is, I'm always here for you.
It's your well-earned time off, so please try to get some rest while you can.
This is... a voucher for the square attractions?
Of course, Commandant. I'd love to.
I'm really looking forward to seeing the square thrive.
It's what a Commissioner is here for.
Let's talk about our reward.
Thanks to you, Lucia.
Got it.
Oh, and take this.
When the square is finally complete, would you visit with me?
